House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00931
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR THE MODERNIZATION OF FIRE PROTECTION AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Seeks to establish a Fire Protection Service (FPS) in local government units; upgrade the existing fire protection services; establish a specialized fire protection and related services with the BFP; provide for training facilities and hiring of internationally accredited training consultants and advisers to accelerate the human resources development program; and ensure that fire protection vehicles of various types, communication equipment and facilities, and other support equipment will be equitably distributed to different fire units.
ALIAS NAME : “Fire Protection Modernization Act.”
